text: @realDonaldTrump @Facebook The only thing you will keep as history is written are the stains of blood on your hands from the unnecessary deaths of tens of thousands of COVID-19 patients. And the knowledge that 40M people lost jobs and the economy tanked with record debt. It will be your forever brand!
